name: Control Quest
description:
Say goodbye to all your controls!

In a land where an evil wizard has taken away everyone's ability to move, you must lift his curse and restore movement to the land.

As a humble peasant named Gwennie, you start only being able to move right. You must reclaim your movement, one new direction at a time, until you have enough keys to take on the wizard at his castle.

Use the environment to you advantage!

The more keys you have, the more places you can go!

Allow the world to move freely once again!

Upcoming Feature

New Areas and Buttons

Wizard Boss Fight 

Credits

CurtisCreate - Programming Level Design

Solitaire Shamus - Art and Visual Design

Tom Zusi - Sound and Music
